subtitle: A community growing in God's love

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: A church that makes disciples of all nations with the love of Jesus Christ, expanding God's kingdom
vision.scripture: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit - Matthew 28:19

mission.title: Mission
mission.discipleship_desc: Growing disciples through Word and prayer
mission.missions_desc: Called to mission to all nations

history.title: Church History
history.founding_desc: Started as a Korean church for Korean immigrants in America
history.growth_desc: Expansion of young adult and next generation ministry
history.present_desc: Growing into a multi-ethnic community serving the local area

beliefs.title: Statement of Faith
beliefs.trinity_desc: We believe in the Triune God - Father, Son, and Holy Spirit
beliefs.scripture_desc: The Bible is God's Word and the sole authority for faith and practice
beliefs.salvation_desc: We believe in salvation through Jesus Christ's work on the cross
beliefs.church_desc: The church is the body of Christ and the community of believers
beliefs.mission_desc: Gospel proclamation and disciple-making is the church's mission
